meta.description: One of the most important projects in the compartmentalized programs

title: Portals: Connecting the Cosmic Highway
cleaned_text: Emery Smith discloses his experience with one of the most important projects in the compartmentalized programs: the discovery and securing of portals to distant worlds. He explains that some are naturally formed and were known to ancient cultures who built temples around them. Many others are manmade, using technology that has not been perfected. The interconnection of these portal systems has become a cosmic highway for many extraterrestrial civilizations, who use portals on Earth as a hub to travel to far away star systems.

opengraph.title: Portals: Connecting the Cosmic Highway
